snippet.title: Night Stalker For The Intellivision
snippet.description: In this video I demonstrate the 1982 Mattel game Night Stalker.  It is not about how high my score was and it is not a speed run.  It is just a video of me playing one of the greatest games of all time.  I also show my strategy for getting further in the game.  I hope you enjoy watching this as much as I enjoy playing it.  INTELLIVISION LIVES!
